  • Uses of RamProvisioner in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.provisioners

    Subclasses of RamProvisioner in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.provisioners
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    RamProvisionerSimple
    RamProvisionerSimple is an extension of RamProvisioner which uses a best-effort policy to allocate memory to VMs: if there is available ram on the host, it allocates; otherwise, it fails.
